abstract: Keeping Score column; New York Mets center fielder Yoenis Cespedes is worth less than $20 million a year; is above-average left fielder with powerful right-handed bat, but does not take enough walks, strikes out frequently and goes through prolonged slumps.
lead_paragraph: Yoenis Cespedes is an above-average left fielder with a powerful right-handed bat who does not take enough walks, strikes out a great deal and goes through extreme slumps.

headline.main: A Streaky Hitter, a Poor Center Fielder and an Appealing Signing
headline.print_headline: A Streaky Hitter, a Poor Center Fielder and an Appealing Signing

snippet: Yoenis Cespedes is an above-average left fielder with a powerful right-handed bat who does not take enough walks, strikes out a great deal and goes through extreme slumps.
